column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A Chinese woman made a very public attempt at suicide on May 21
column4: 2019 at the front of U-Care Pharmacy at No. 17
column5: Sothearos St. in Sangkat Tonle Bassac
column9: was sitting in a chair in front of the drug store. She was talking with other Chinese men and seems to have got into an argument
column10: then she took  medicine from her handbag and swallowed a large quantity of pills.------People reported to the police who were patrolling
column11: who ordered her to hospital in an Alphard with 3 or 4 Chinese men.------ ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/307300
